title: The Gazebo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food
description: Fast food restaurant located on the main floor of the Campus Center of Andrews University. Serves a variety of foods such as Fri-pats and other vegetarian sandwiches, corn dogs, French fries, sub sandwiches, pizza, ice cream, and beverages. Also offers a special Mexican menu, including tacos and burritos. During Sabbath, opens 6pm-9pm.
